LIBC_CONF_ERRNO_MODE.doc: The implementation used for errno, acceptable values are LIBC_ERRNO_MODE_DEFAULT, LIBC_ERRNO_MODE_UNDEFINED, LIBC_ERRNO_MODE_THREAD_LOCAL, LIBC_ERRNO_MODE_SHARED, LIBC_ERRNO_MODE_EXTERNAL, and LIBC_ERRNO_MODE_SYSTEM.

LIBC_CONF_PRINTF_DISABLE_FLOAT.doc: Disable printing floating point values in printf and friends.

LIBC_CONF_PRINTF_DISABLE_INDEX_MODE.doc: Disable index mode in the printf format string.

LIBC_CONF_PRINTF_DISABLE_WRITE_INT.doc: Disable handling of %n in printf format string.

LIBC_CONF_PRINTF_FLOAT_TO_STR_USE_MEGA_L.doc: Use large table for better printf long double performance.

LIBC_CONF_PRINTF_DISABLE_FIXED_POINT.doc: Disable printing fixed point values in printf and friends.

LIBC_CONF_SCANF_DISABLE_FLOAT.doc: Disable parsing floating point values in scanf and friends.

LIBC_CONF_SCANF_DISABLE_INDEX_MODE.doc: Disable index mode in the scanf format string.

LIBC_CONF_STRING_UNSAFE_WIDE_READ.doc: Read more than a byte at a time to perform byte-string operations like strlen.

LIBC_CONF_MEMSET_X86_USE_SOFTWARE_PREFET.doc: Inserts prefetch for write instructions (PREFETCHW) for memset on x86 to recover performance when hardware prefetcher is disabled.

LIBC_CONF_KEEP_FRAME_POINTER.doc: Keep frame pointer in functions for better debugging experience.

LIBC_CONF_ENABLE_STRONG_STACK_PROTECTOR.doc: Enable -fstack-protector-strong to defend against stack smashing attack.

LIBC_CONF_TIMEOUT_ENSURE_MONOTONICITY.doc: Automatically adjust timeout to CLOCK_MONOTONIC (default to true). POSIX API may require CLOCK_REALTIME, which can be unstable and leading to unexpected behavior. This option will convert the real-time timestamp to monotonic timestamp relative to the time of call.

LIBC_CONF_RAW_MUTEX_DEFAULT_SPIN_COUNT.doc: Default number of spins before blocking if a mutex is in contention (default to 100).

LIBC_CONF_RWLOCK_DEFAULT_SPIN_COUNT.doc: Default number of spins before blocking if a rwlock is in contention (default to 100).

LIBC_CONF_MATH_OPTIMIZATIONS.doc: Configures optimizations for math functions. Values accepted are LIBC_MATH_SKIP_ACCURATE_PASS, LIBC_MATH_SMALL_TABLES, LIBC_MATH_NO_ERRNO, LIBC_MATH_NO_EXCEPT, and LIBC_MATH_FAST.

LIBC_CONF_QSORT_IMPL.doc: Configures sorting algorithm for qsort and qsort_r. Values accepted are LIBC_QSORT_QUICK_SORT, LIBC_QSORT_HEAP_SORT.

LIBC_CONF_SETJMP_AARCH64_RESTORE_PLATFOR.doc: Make setjmp save the value of x18, and longjmp restore it. The AArch64 ABI delegates this register to platform ABIs, which can choose whether to make it caller-saved.

LIBC_CONF_TIME_64BIT.doc: Force the size of time_t to 64 bits, even on platforms where compatibility considerations would otherwise make it 32-bit.

LIBC_ADD_NULL_CHECKS.doc: Add nullptr checks in the library's implementations to some functions for which passing nullptr is undefined behavior.
